attributes.action: Make CHILD CRIME (INCLUDING CHILD PORN) EQUAL WITH HARSH SENTENCES TO MATCH.
attributes.additional_details: VOTE 'NO' TO THE 'SEVERITY TARIFF', MAKING CHILD PORN LESS SERIOUS AND NOT REQUIRING TIME IN PRISON.
attributes.background: DO NOT ALLOW INNOCENT CHILDREN TO BE 'THROWN TO THE WOLVES'

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
